summary: An illicit relationship between a Kathakali dancer and a young woman from an upper caste family results in an illegitimate child. He faces hardships when she refuses to let him see their child.
cast: Mohanlal|Suhasini|Mattanoor Shankara Marar|Kalamandalam Gopi|Venmani Haridas|Kukku Parameshwaram|Venmani Vishnu|Kalamandalam Kesavan|Sindhu Shyam|Bindu Panikkar|Keezhpatam Kumar Nair|Appukutty Poduval
title: Vanaprastham
